thread.section_title: Cell2Get Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cell2Get Inc | www.cell2get.com
thread.title: Francis

author: Francis
title: Francis
text: Me and my friends all wanted to have matching cell phones. We tried finding cheap prices on ebay but wanted to buy them all at once. We looked on different websites for a place to buy 5 at one time and came across Cell2get. we liked how they had lower prices than the samsung website. We bought all 5 phones and chipped in together because Ryan was scrapped for cash. We explained the situation to Customer Service and they explained to us that as long as payment was done on through one credit card we should have the phones shipped without a problem. We got the phones shipped together but told Ryan that he had to charge them. We like this website.
